text:
Thank you so much for allowing me
to upload your dream earlier. It is a
truly sweet dream, and so I have
arranged what I hope is a truly
sweet gift for you.

I am certain many memories of your
island are dear to you. What if you
could share those memories in the
form of a pleasant dream? You can,
and it is as easy as falling asleep in
your bed...

I am so glad we met the other day.
Please know that whenever you
wish to share a treasured memory
of your island, or should you want
to dream another's dream, you
need only fall asleep in your bed.

Dreams need not always begin with
a destination in mind. I believe you
would agree, so I will now offer to
surprise you with fine dreams of my
choosing. You never know where a
surprise may take you!
